title: Stock Indicator with Delivery Time
description: Animated low stock indicator with blinking dot and delivery time
longDescription: A dynamic stock indicator badge with an animated blinking dot to create urgency. Perfect for displaying low stock alerts and delivery time information. Features a smooth pulsing animation on the indicator dot to grab attention. Fully customizable colors, sizes, and text. Responsive design with customizable border, padding, and font sizes. Ideal for creating urgency and improving conversion rates on product pages.
